name: Omni Empire
description:
This game was made in 72hrs for the 50th Ludum Dare game jam.

Here's the link to my LD 50 page: https://ldjam.com/events/ludum-dare/50/omni-empire

Code, graphics, music and sounds made during the jam by arqitech.

I hope you enjoy playing! :D

- arqitech

If the browser version of the game doesn't work, please download.
